thread.title: Marks & Spencer fails to sustain fourth quarter sales momentum
thread.title_full: Marks & Spencer fails to sustain fourth quarter sales momentum

title: Marks & Spencer fails to sustain fourth quarter sales momentum
text:
07 Jul 2015 | By Alec Mattinson 
Marks & Spencer’s first quarter trading has met the City’s modest expectations, but its overall like-for-like sales growth fell back to zero after a 0.7% rise in the fourth quarter. Available to members only
